snippet.title: The Wandering Village - Gameplay Trailer | Day of the Devs 2021
snippet.description:
Inspired by Frostpunk and Airborne Kingdom, The Wandering Village is a city-builder taking place on the back of a giant, living creature whose travels, health, and mood will influence how your village grows, just as your choices in building your village will influence the creature.

#SummerGamesFest
